frontmatter.title: Notes on Difference in Differences Estimation
frontmatter.short: Before and After.  This is a basic comparison of means for the time periods before and after treatment.   For this specification we assume that Y in the post-treatment period is equal to Y in the pre-treatment period in the absence of treatment.
frontmatter.keywords: data science programming, datascientist, job of data scientist, data driven insights, data driven solutions
frontmatter.hero_alt: Notes on Difference in Differences Estimation
